Below is a complete HTML page that implements the described clinical guideline decision-making algorithm. This page includes HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity: ```html Maternal Transfer and Onsite Handover of Care Guideline

Questions

Relevant Questions:

Is this a transfer within hospital, from home to hospital, or between hospitals?

Guidance

Please select a clinical context to see specific guidance.
``` This HTML page provides an interactive interface where users can select a clinical context from a dropdown menu, answer relevant questions, and receive dynamic guidance based on their responses. The layout is divided into two columns, with questions on the left and guidance on the right, as specified. The page also includes basic accessibility features and responsive design elements.
